verse.name: c1a
verse.lines:
Come praise Him exalt Him
And worship His name
Today and forever
He's always the same

verse.name: c1b
verse.lines:
Come praise Him my Savior
The Lamb that was slain
Come praise Him exalt Him
The Lord is His name
